summary: A test module that uses Moto to mock AWS services and boto3 to exercise Kinesis Video Archived Media client operations, including retrieving video clips and generating DASH and HLS streaming session URLs, though the tests are currently not invoked.
business_intent: Ensure that the Kinesis Video Archived Media SDK functions for clip extraction and streaming URL generation behave correctly in a simulated AWS environment, providing confidence in time-range handling and streaming protocol support.
